```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)

# This package install script was modified by @timathomas, adapted from the ipak function created by @stevenworthington https://gist.github.com/stevenworthington/3178163

# Install Package Function via Github Method to Avoid Binary Errors
ipak_gh <- function(pkg){
    new.pkg <- pkg[!(sub('.*/', '', pkg) %in% installed.packages()[, "Package"])]
    if (length(new.pkg)) 
        remotes::install_github(new.pkg, dependencies = TRUE)
    sapply(sub('.*/', '', pkg), require, character.only = TRUE)

}

# Setup package list
dev.packages <- c("r-lib/devtools",
                  "tidyverse/tidyverse",
                  "walkerke/tigris",
                  "r-spatial/sf",
                  "hrecht/censusapi",
                  "r-lib/httr",
                  "thomasp85/ggforce",
                  "yihui/tinytex",
                  "crsh/papaja",
                  "crsh/citr"
              )

# Install Packages
ipak_gh(dev.packages)

```
